scripts.prod: npm run lint && npx cpr ./src ./dist -d && npx sass ./dist/scss/:./dist/pages/styles --no-source-map --style=compressed && npx rimraf ./dist/scss && node .\tools\zip.js
scripts.dev: npx rimraf ./src/pages/styles && npm run lint && npx sass ./src/scss/:./src/pages/styles --no-source-map --style=compressed
